system.novice: Navigator removes one level of Fatigue, and adds +10 to Investigation Test made within the next Hour. Can only use power once every 24 hours.
system.adept: Navigator isntead removes up to 2 Fatigue, and also adds +5 to all Navigation(Warp) Tests made in the next hour.
system.master: Navigator instead removes up to 3 Fatigue, and instead adds +10 to all Navigation (Warp) Tests for the next eight hours.

description.value:
Novice: Navigator removes one level of Fatigue, and adds +10 to Investigation Test made within the next Hour. Can only use power once every 24 hours.

Adept: Navigator isntead removes up to 2 Fatigue, and also adds +5 to all Navigation(Warp) Tests made in the next hour.

Master: Navigator instead removes up to 3 Fatigue, and instead adds +10 to all Navigation (Warp) Tests for the next eight hours.
